snippet: Rick Santorum found himself in damage-control mode on Thursday after calling English primacy a condition for Puerto Rican statehood.
abstract: Rick Santorum and his aides are scrambling to contain political damage and outrage after Santorum statement that Puerto Rico would need to adopt English as its official language in order to become a state; Santorum lost his single Puerto Rican delegate after he became offended at the remark.

byline.original: By KATHARINE Q. SEELYE and ASHLEY PARKER

lead_paragraph: Rick Santorum found himself in damage-control mode on Thursday after calling English primacy a condition for Puerto Rican statehood.

headline.seo: Santorum Addresses Firestorm Over Puerto Rico Remarks
headline.main: For Santorum, Trying to Tamp Down a Firestorm Over Puerto Rico Remarks
headline.print_headline: For Santorum, Trying to Tamp Down a Firestorm Over Puerto Rico Remarks
